name: Tiny garden (Stingby12)
description:
A small puzzle game where you are an acorn tasked to grow a multitude of plants in a garden.

Source code :

https://auroriax.github.io/PuzzleScript/editor.html?hack=2a77b3e44f79b9b1d6ed201...

Controls :

Arrow keys to move
X to select
Z to undo, R to restart
